title: Calories in Queso Fresco Cheese
meta_description: Learn calories in queso fresco cheese per 100 g, with a full nutrition profile including protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and preparation tips.
assumptions: Fresh, crumbled queso fresco cheese, typical Mexican variety, made from cow's milk, no added ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, milk type, salt content, and freshness. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of queso fresco cheese provides ~300 kcal and ~18 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp olive oil when crumbling

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 oz of queso fresco cheese?
faqs.a: About 85 kcal per 28 g (1 oz) serving.

faqs.q: What's the protein content in queso fresco cheese?
Is queso fresco cheese high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 847 mg sodium per 100 g due to salting during production.
Low carbs at 2.2 g per 100 g, mostly from milk sugars.

faqs.q: How does queso fresco compare to other cheeses calorie-wise?
faqs.a: Similar to feta or fresh goat cheese, around 300 kcal per 100 g, but softer and milder.
